name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - 8 Popular Squadron Emblems
summary: This DLC pack includes eight emblems from older Ace Combat games: Aquila, Wardog, Garuda, Gryphus, and low-visibility versions of each. It can only be purchased directly in Japan (all platforms) and Asia (PS4 and Xbox One); in all other regions, it is only available in special editions.
